citation: Proclamation under the Roads and Jetties Act 1935 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Roads and Jetties Act 1935

I, the Lieutenant-Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 52A of the Roads and Jetties Act 1935 –

        (a) amend the proclamation notified in the Gazette as Statutory Rules 1998, No. 186 by omitting Schedule 2 to that proclamation and substituting the following Schedule:

            SCHEDULE 2 - Places of access

                         Location                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
            Description                                                                          1. Weymouth Road – north side  1.54  2. School Road – south side  1.54  3. Back Creek Road – north side  2.70  4. Pipers River Secondary Road – south side  2.70  5. Industry Road – south side  3.69  6. Troopers Track – south side  7.20  7. Lefroy Road – north side  8.74  8. Dalrymple Road – south side  13.51  9. Atkins Road – south side  16.89  10. Access Road – north side  18.99
                         Distance in kilometres west of eastern abutment of Pipers River Bridge                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
            
            (b) declare that this proclamation takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.
    26 July 2004

    W. J. E. Cox

    Lieutenant-Governor

    By His Excellency's Command,

    Bryan Green

    Minister for Infrastructure, Energy and Resources

    Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

    Notified in the Gazette on 4 August 2004

    This proclamation is administered by the Department of Infrastructure, Energy and Resources.
